:::Data looked around the carved out hollow mountain. Defection and 
HeraldAngle were laying on tables. The Maximal matrix of Leadership was 
sitting on a pedestal in-between them. Gigatron sat at a computer console. 
Data walked toward the Matrix. He opened his chest plate and reviled his 
spark. He picked up the Matrix and yelled so that the mountain shook:::

"Become Now as you did for Rodimus Prime and light my darkest hour!!!!!"

:::The matrix opened and light streamed towards his spark and the bodies of 
Defection and HeraldAngle. Defection Gained his 3rd title, Datamus Prime. 
Suddenly a celestial body that resembled Herald and one that resembled 
Defection, fell from the sky and entered there respected bodies. Each body 
was follows by a spark. Herald and Defection  got up and seemed to glow with 
power. Herald and Defection said in unison:::

herald and defection: "we must Make Gigatron a keeper. Do you except 
Gigatron?"
